about_the_game:
This new DLC for King Arthur Knight's Tale includes:
  • New skirmish maps: Challenge your tactical skills and defeat a mysterious tribe of Picts in ten uniquely designed optional skirmish maps.
  • Five difficulty levels: Complete the skirmish maps on Easy, Normal, Moderate, Hard or Very Hard difficulties.
  • New achievement: Earn 35 Skirmish Score to unlock a new achievement.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence on fantasy creatures and humans.

detailed_description:
This new DLC for King Arthur Knight's Tale includes:
  • New skirmish maps: Challenge your tactical skills and defeat a mysterious tribe of Picts in ten uniquely designed optional skirmish maps.
  • Five difficulty levels: Complete the skirmish maps on Easy, Normal, Moderate, Hard or Very Hard difficulties.
  • New achievement: Earn 35 Skirmish Score to unlock a new achievement.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 4770k / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Defeat a mysterious tribe of Picts in ten uniquely designed skirmish maps, including five difficulty settings. This content requires the base game King Arthur: Knight's Tale in order to run.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
